title: (x) gibsonrenata asks @typeid please help me identify this font: http://twitpic.com/14rjtl - Futura Extra Bold {Florian}
author: Florian Hardwig

comments.content:
That’s [Futura Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825141437/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/futura-nd/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D66%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DGEST%25C3%2583O%2520HOSPITALAR%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D27?refby=mfde), stretched and slanted.  
F
